main event: A saucer-shaped object approximately 20 feet in diameter was observed hovering and then accelerating rapidly out of sight over Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on March 25, 1954 and lasted for 1 minute and 30 seconds., The object was reported to be soundless., It was identified as a probable balloon., The observation was made from a civilian perspective., A second sighting on June 26, 1954 described a yellow and blurred object that changed in size and faded away.
witness description: The witness provided limited personal details including being male and aged 34, reported observing the object while sitting on a patio.
